file_content.text: We're going to be alright now, soldier. No matter what happens.
I'm so sorry, Jaller... so sorry....
You, you're a soldier, right? From the fort? Please, help us. We're really sick--my wife is dying.
Forget it... ungh... I'll be f--fine, Zak, just get that soldier out of here!
No, Jaller! Please, soldier--the medics at the fort--I talked to them earlier. Please, tell them to send help!
As long as you tell me what I need to know, everything will be alright.
I'll help you if you help me.
You what? I--I don't understand. What would you need our help with?
When did your symptoms begin, sir?
How did you get so sick?
I already told the medics at the fort. I--I don't know how it happened.
You're a separatist, and you helped steal our bomb, didn't you!
Don't ask me for help, scum!
What? I--I don't know what you're talking about, soldier.
You've been poisoned by radiation from a stolen Republic bomb.
You have radiation sickness.
What? You mean... Jaller, do you know anything about this?
Admit what you know, and you won't be in any trouble.
I just want the truth, Zak.
Your symptoms say you know exactly what I'm talking about, Zak.
Don't play dumb with me!
I don't understand. W--we haven't done anything wrong. Jaller, what have your friends gotten us into?
Quiet, Zak. We don't know anything about... ungh... anything.
They're the reason we're both sick, aren't they? You're dying because of them!
Zak, don't. You'll ruin everything. The movement--
The movement sold us out! They don't care about us--they just care about their weapons and their secrets.
As long as you help me out, nothing bad will happen to you.
Cooperate--no harm will come.
Both of you, keep your hands where I can see them.
Stay right where you are.
Ha. You're too late, soldier--we're both dead already.
Start talking or you're dead.
It's too late. We're dead already. We'll never help you, Republic scum.
But it's not too late, Jaller! They have medicine and doctors at the fort. I'm sure if we just--
No! I'll never betray the movement. Never.
Let's not make this any harder than it has to be, ma'am.
I don't want you to suffer.
The "movement" got you into this mess. Why would you defend them?
Why protect these people?
If you want to spend the rest of your life in brutal agony, be my guest.
Go ahead and die, then.
Jaller, they aren't worth dying for. Think of me. I love you.
If you love me, Zak, you won't betray everything I stand for. Please let me go.
Please, Jaller. No.
If you give me the bomb, I'll give you the cure and forget this ever happened.
Help me and I'll cure you.
I--I don't have the bomb. But... but I'll tell you where it is.
Use this injector. It will cure your radiation poisoning--both of you.
Here--this will heal you both.
R--really? Thank you. Thank you so much.
No, Zak... not worth....
Shhhh. You're going to be okay, now. I'm not going to lose you, Jaller. I'm not.
You've saved us, soldier. You've saved Jaller. I owe you everything.
All I ask is that you tell me where the ZR-57 is.
I need to find this bomb, Zak.
If you want to repay your debt, you'll tell me where that bomb is.
I helped you, now you help me.
You'll be living your healthy lives in prison unless I get the bomb.
Then start talking--now.
Oh right, th--the crate.
Jaller and I helped move this really big crate. We got sick right afterward--I'm sure it's what you're looking for.
We dropped the crate off at the stronghold--it's the separatists' main base.
I'll just find the bomb on my own. Have fun burying your wife, Zak.
Enjoy dying, then.
No. No! I'm sorry, Jaller, but I refuse to let you die for this.
Don't, Zak... don't....
There was this big crate we helped move. I never saw inside, b--but I'm sure it's what you're looking for. We got sick right after we handled it.
We took the crate up to the stronghold--that's the separatists' main base on the island.
Now please, you have to help my wife!
This will cure your radiation poisoning. Thank you for helping me.
Here--take this injector.
You held up your end of the deal. This injector will heal you both.
Fair enough, here's the cure.
Here, love... this will make you feel much better.
No, Zak... please....
Shhhh. Everything is going to be alright, now.
I appreciate your cooperation.
So long, soldier.
This is a second chance--make the most of it.
Don't waste this opportunity.
We will. I can promise you that.
If you've lied to me, you will pay for it--both of you. Understood?
Your story better check out.
I--I understand.
You've betrayed the Republic and helped steal a weapon capable of slaughtering thousands. You'll get no help from me.
Traitors receive no mercy.
But I helped you! How can you do this?
I--I told you....
I'm so sorry, Jaller... I'm so sorry....
Um, hello, trooper.
Hello.
